typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		empname as string,
		salary as string,
		deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipLines: 1) ~> empcsvdataflow
empcsvdataflow sink(input(
		Empid as string,
		empname as string,
		salary as string,
		deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Empid = empid,
		empname,
		salary,
		deptid
	)) ~> emptesttable
